ðŸ“– Summary: PaddleOCR is a production-ready OCR and document AI engine that converts documents and images into structured, AI-friendly data like JSON and Markdown. It supports over 80 languages and offers end-to-end solutions for text extraction and intelligent document understanding, making it suitable for various AI applications.
